title: Sum of Even Numbers
description: Given an integer array `nums`, return the sum of all even numbers in the array.
output_format: An integer representing the sum of all even numbers in `nums`.

examples.explanation: The even numbers are 2, 4, and 6. Their sum is 2 + 4 + 6 = 12.
There are no even numbers in the array.
The input array is empty, so the sum of even numbers is 0.

title: Sum of Even Numbers
description: Given an array of integers, return the sum of all even numbers in the array.
output_format: An integer representing the sum of all even numbers.

examples.explanation: The even numbers are 2, 4, and 6. Their sum is 2 + 4 + 6 = 12.
There are no even numbers in the array.
All numbers are even. Their sum is 2 + 4 + 6 + 8 = 20.
The array is empty, so the sum of even numbers is 0.

approaches.name: Linear Scan
approaches.description: Iterate through the array and check if each number is even using the modulo operator (%). If it's even, add it to the sum.
